author: Smallsam99
title: Why bad Reviews?
review:
This set is good and I only got it for 1 buck! I like small vehicles for lego battles and like this one's design. I think people judge this set too fast because it really isn't that bad!

pros: gun and bionioculars

car design

crate

Cons: another sinister!( i have to admit he is cool but is used to much in this theme)

nothin else!

It is worth it and I reccomend buying it from $1.00-$5.00 price range.

author: hustla187
title: OK Car
review: This is an OK car but I've seen better in the Adventurers sets. You do get a Sam Sinister minifig(can be known also as Baron von Barron), but he appears alot in the Oreint Expedition sets. This isn't bad, but isn't the best.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Adventurers (Orient Expedition) - Black Cruiser
review:
The Black Cruiser (7524) is a LEGO Adventurers (Orient Expedition) set which came out in 2003. It comes with 1 minifig and 28 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/7424-1.jpg[/img]


Minifigures:

Lord Sam Sininster: Lord Sam Sininster comes with black top hat, a black jacket with a white scarf on it, dark gray pants and a dark gray hook for a hand. On his face you can see that he's wearing only one piece of glasses on his one eye (I don't know what that one is called) and Sam Sininster also has a beard and a red scratch on his face.

Black Cruiser:

The black cruiser is very simple to build and very stury. On the front you can see the headlights and a grill and a small windscreen. There's also a steering wheel in the front and on the back you can find a brown box with a gun and a pair of binoculars.

Positive:

Great pieces which you can youse for brickfilms or MOC's
Minifig
Very sturdy
Nice starter set
No stickers

Negative:

Not so many play features


All in all it's a great set to get and I would highly recommend you to get this model. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full galery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de/
